content: let these three magical shooting stars light up your holiday celebration stitched in bernat velvet minis make crochet star charms as you practice chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet and simple embroidery techniques customize your charms in any colors your heart desires hang them on your tree or use them to adorn a gift for someone special either way these cuties are sure to leave you wishing materials bernat® velvet™ mini balls 1 kit kit includes 20 balls 1 2 oz/35 g 41 yds/38 m each 25 oz/700g 820 yds/750 m total version 1 contrast a ever after pink 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m contrast b burgundy plum 1 ball or 7 yds/6 m contrast c blackbird 1 ball or 1 yd/1 m measurement approx 3¾ 9 5 cm across excluding tassel
